title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1802.1 - Notification and method
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1802.1 - Notification and method

State Regulations
(a) Notification of intention to dispose of project real property shall be given to
the commissioner by the agency before any final steps are taken to dispose of
same. Such notification shall identify the property and the method of
disposition. (b) The method of
disposition shall be by public auction or by sealed bid unlessthe disposition
is to be made pursuant to and in accordance with the provisions of subdivision
2 of section 507 of the Law. (c) Until an urban renewal plan is approved, no property in an urban renewal area, acquired during early acquisition, shall be sold. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1802.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
